title: RET Midi Mini Project
description: Implementation of a music generating model trained by a Long Short-Term Memory artificial neural network

title: Repo Gallery
description: Uses GitHub's API to pull data from my GitHub portfolio to create a gallery of repos. Visitors to the site can click on the repos to see more details and a link to the repo.

title: Super Sticky Notes
description: A greenfield project that allows the user to create “sticky notes” on their computer to keep track of to-do items. Uses multiple components to build the classic sticky note UI with the ability to add, edit, delete and search for notes.

title: Name Tag Generator
description: Name tag generator that allows the user to create bulk name tags using functional components and ES6 modules.

title: Unplugged Retreat
description: A multi-page responsive website coded with Flexbox. The design allows users to view content effectively based on their device.

title: Guess the Word Game
description: Players guess the word by entering one letter at a time. If the player guesses all the letters correctly before they use up their allotted guesses, they win!

title: Bikewatching
description: A visualization of Boston and Cambridge bike paths and bike stations. Stations are represented by circles, where location data is dynamically updated as the map is panned or zoomed.
